import "./Checkout.css"; import CheckoutService from "../../services/checkout.service"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; // TODO: implments checkout.. export const Checkout = () => { const [offers, setOffers] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { CheckoutService.getAllOffersFromCard().then((offer) => setOffers(offer.data) ); }, []); let totalSum = 0; offers.map((offer) => { return (totalSum += Number(offer.offerPrice)); }); const offerId = 1; const buyerId = 1; const offerTitle = "Pompica"; const offerPrice = 123; const data = { offerId, buyerId, offerTitle, offerPrice, }; const onCreate = () => { CheckoutService.addOfferToCard(data); }; return (

Payment

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nunc quam urna, dignissim nec auctor in, mattis vitae leo.

Checkout

{offers.map((offer) => (
{offer.offerPrice} €

{offer.offerTitle}

))}
Total{totalSum} €

Credit Card Details

/
); };
